title: Shizukanaru Don: Yakuza Side Story
synopsis: This manga depicts the life of Shizuya Kondou, a man who designs underwear by day and is "don" of a gang at night.
characters: ['Kondou, Shizuya', 'Toshibo, Hijikata', 'Nigeno', 'Shinpachi, Namakura', 'Akino, Akemi', 'Ryuzou, Ookubo', 'Kondou, Tae']
voices: ['Matsumoto, Yasunori', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Suzuki, Kiyonobu', 'Satou, Masaharu', 'Touma, Yumi', 'Katou, Seizou', 'Matsushima, Minori']
